entry.title: blogging with octopress
entry.content:
Installation instructions

git clone git@github.com:mizanRahman/mizanrahman.github.io.git
git checkout -b source origin/source
rake setup_github_pages

How to run

rake preview

create new post

rake new_post["title"]

deploy/publish your change

rake genrate
rake deploy

commit changes to source branch and push to the repository

git add .
git commit -m 'your message'
git push origin source

More help:

  • http://octopress.org/docs/blogging/
  • http://octopress.org/docs/deploying/github/

entry.title: Of lorems and ipsii
entry.content:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. At vero eos et accusam et justo duo1 dolores et ea rebum. Stet clita kasd gubergren, no sea takimata sanctus est Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

Some code:

var hello = function (name) {
  console.log("Hello, " + name + '.');
}
hello('World');   // prints 'Hello, World.' to stdout

Some more code

def test
  @answer = 6*9
  if @answer != 42  # this should never happen
    raise "Oh no, not again."
  else
    print "Don't panic."
end
